items.question: What tools do I need for coloring my patterns?
items.answer: You can use any coloring tools you prefer! Our patterns work beautifully with colored pencils, markers, gel pens, or even digital coloring apps. The patterns are designed to work with whatever medium you enjoy most.

items.question: Can I print patterns in different sizes?
items.answer: Yes! All patterns are provided in high-resolution PDF format that can be printed in various sizes from standard letter/A4 up to larger formats. You can print at home or take to a print shop for larger formats.

items.question: How many unique patterns can I access?
items.answer: Our system can generate an unlimited variety of patterns. Free members can create 3 new patterns monthly, while paid plans offer 20 or unlimited generations depending on your subscription level.

items.question: Are the patterns suitable for beginners and children?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can specify your desired complexity level from very simple patterns perfect for beginners and children to intricate designs for experienced colorists. You control the complexity based on your preferences.

items.question: Can I share or sell my colored creations?
items.answer: You can freely share your colored creations on social media and with friends. The basic license allows for personal use and sharing of completed work. Commercial licenses for selling colored patterns are available with our Artist plan.
